Actions.Name: Get total impact
Actions.Description: How many trees has this user planted, and how many tons of CO2 emissions have been offset.

Actions.Name: Get total tons of CO2e offset
Actions.Description: The total number of tons of CO2e emissions has this user offset.

Actions.Name: Get total number of trees
Actions.Description: The total number of trees this user has planted.

Actions.Name: Purchase carbon offsets
Actions.Description: Use this action to purchase 1 or more KG of carbon offsets per request.

Actions.Name: Purchase trees
Actions.Description: Use this action to purchase 1 or more trees per request.
